title: The Besties 67 - A wild Grant appears
description:
This week there is no me. Yes, due to a mysterious stomach virus, I, your Besties poster was unable to attend the weekly podcast. But don't worry, because another, balder and smarter Chris filled the vacancy. This week, I hope you enjoy the silky smooth tones of Polygon Editor-in-Chief Chris Grant.

4:05 - The best use of consonants (Rymdkapsel)
15:25 - The best reason to not listen to Russ Frushtick (Earthbound)
24:40 - Halftime!
38:00 - The best career move (John Carmack becomes CTO of Oculus)
48:55 - The best single-player co-op game of the year (Brothers: A Tale of Two Sons)
58:00 - The winner is...

Theme song by Ian Dorsch
Get the show:

Download MP3"
Subscribe to the podcast (RSS)
Subscribe on iTunes
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (The Besties)
